where the arguments of the constructor are:

  • the id attribute of the <form> that should be connected to the content,
  • a function that initializes the mapping between content elements and form fields,
  • a handler for server-side errors,
  • (optional) a handler called when the form is initialized (i.e., when content elements are written to the form)
  • (optional) a wait handler, called when data are sent/received and when sending/receiving is completed.
